title: Manage Container Seal Check at Gate
description: For a high-value cargo container, the shipper has requested a seal check upon entry to the port.

tasks.description: The system flags a container at the gate for a mandatory seal check based on shipper instructions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The gate clerk receives an alert to perform a manual seal verification.

tasks.description: The clerk physically inspects the container's seal and compares the seal number to the one in the documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk confirms the physical seal number matches the number on the Bill of Lading.

tasks.description: The clerk logs the successful verification in the system and allows the truck to proceed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The seal check is logged as 'Verified OK', and the truck enters the terminal.
